mapper.select: select members_no, members_id, members_name, members_image, members_addr, members_mail from members where MEMBERS_NO = #{membersNo}

select (select count(*) from proj_applicants where members_no=#{memberNo} AND status='지원') proj_apply, (select count(*) from proj_applicants where members_no=#{memberNo} AND status='승인') proj_approve, (select count(*) from proj_applicants where members_no=#{memberNo} AND status='참여') proj_participant from dual
select a.proj_no "projNo", b.proj_title "projTitle", a.apply_no "applyNo" from PROJ_APPLICANTS a join PROJECTS b on a.proj_no = b.proj_no where a.members_no=#{membersNo} and a.status=#{status}
mapper.update: update PROJ_APPLICANTS set status='참여' where apply_no=#{applyNo}
mapper.select: select apply_no, members_no, proj_no, status, participant_name, email, phone_no, address, cover_letter from PROJ_APPLICANTS_STATUS_VIEW where proj_no in ( select proj_no from PROJECTS where members_no=#{pmNo}) order by status_no
select proj_no, proj_title, proj_members_cnt, proj_store_url from PROJECTS where members_no=#{membersNo}
